question: I need a brief history of the telescope and a generated image of a modern telescope design.
true_answer: The telescope was invented in the early 1600s with significant contributions by Hans Lippershey and Galileo Galilei. Modern telescopes now utilize advanced optics and digital technology. Image of a modern telescope design generated.

Can you tell me how telescopes have evolved over time?
Plan: 1) Search for the evolution of telescopes. 2) Provide a concise summary.
Searching for information on the evolution of telescopes.
Telescopes have evolved from simple optical lenses to complex systems using mirrors and advanced electronics for improved resolution and data capture.
